programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o max.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
k1 oscili 1, 10.0, 1 ;combine 3 sinusses k2 oscili 1, 1.0, 1 ;at different rates k3 oscili 1, 3.0, 1 kmax max k1, k2, k3 kmax = kmax*250 ;scale kmax printk2 kmax ;check the values
aout vco2 .5, 220, 6 ;sawtooth asig moogvcf2 aout, 600+kmax, .5 ;change filter around 600 Hz outs asig, asig
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 32768 10 1
i1 0 5 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
